name: Dasarath G
about: Electronics engineering graduate with a passion for decoding complex systems across multiple domains. With over three years of diverse experience in startups, research labs, and industry, I've spearheaded projects in healthcare, environment, governance, and finance. My expertise spans Full Stack Development, Web3, IoT, Embedded Systems, and AI, allowing me to craft innovative solutions that bridge technological gaps. As a successful freelancer and team leader, I've completed over 10 projects with a 100% satisfaction rate, demonstrating my ability to deliver results in software development, embedded electronics, and robotics. Currently contributing to the future of decentralized collaboration as a Web3 Developer at Globe & Citizen, where I'm helping build the CNC Portal to revolutionize open-source contribution recognition and governance.

experience.title: Core Contributor
responsibilities: CTRLDefi is a non-profit public goods project supported by Ethereum Foundation grant

Leading the development of the 'Instant Send App', enabling effortless, secure stablecoin transfers through Telegram, with Solana wallets, USDC support, and seamless contact integration for a decentralized user experience
Also working on researching Account Abstraction solutions compatible with Telegram MiniApps and optimize user experience for crypto newcomers, focusing on simplicity and ease of use

experience.title: Web3 Developer
responsibilities: Working on the development of the CNC Portal, an innovative web interface enabling users to deploy, access, and manage smart contracts that define and operate crypto-native corporations.

Architecting and implementing full-stack solutions using Vue.js, Tailwind, DaisyUI for frontend, and Node.js with Prisma and PostgreSQL for backend, ensuring seamless user experiences and robust data management.
Driving quality assurance through comprehensive testing with Vitest and Cypress, while maintaining CI/CD pipelines for streamlined development processes.

The portal focuses on micro-contribution recognition and effective governance tools through smart contracts in Solidity, for decentralized e-voting, banking, token management and Board of Directors (BoD) governance.

testimonials.name: Dmitry Sokolov
testimonials.content: I recommend Dasarath for both his professional skills and general/personal qualities. We have worked closely on a daily basis for over four months in the CTRL team. Dasarath is responsible, reliable, able to estimate deadlines for tasks, and builds quickly and in time, delivering well in advance of deadlines in ~50% of cases. He is diligent, hard-working, proactive, easy-going, vigorous, and responsive in communication. He adapts and learns quickly, is humble, not greedy or selfish, and regularly exceeds expectations. I have still not found any serious minuses about Dasarath during our cooperation. I enjoy working with him and would like to build a long-term relationship both in work and as friends.

testimonials.name: Dr. Ravi Seyed-Mahmoud
testimonials.content: A real joy to work with, a highly versatile, motivated and engaged developer, fluent in English and is a real asset to the team.  Dasarath joined our Web3 company and has quickly adapted to the web3 stack, demonstrating a proactive approach. His engaged and enthusiastic demeanor has allowed him to bring forward creative ideas and valuable contributions, which have been a net benefit to the company's growth. Two more outstanding qualities to highlight: his ability to effectively collaborate with the entire team, including the company owner, manager, and colleagues, and his proactive, self-starter attitude that enables him to work effectively with minimal direction. We are currently working together, and I hope this continues.

testimonials.name: Dr. Yeh-Liang Hsu
testimonials.content: Dasarath is a well-educated young man who is gentle and polite. He quickly adapted to the environment and got along well with the team. Furthermore, his professional skills are commendable. Even when faced with unfamiliar problems, he demonstrated a willingness to take on challenges and exhibited a quick learning ability. We assigned Dasarath to several real projects, and he made significant contributions that greatly benefited our team.

testimonials.name: Ivo Brett
testimonials.content: Very good communicator and really took the time to understand the brief. The work completed was of high quality. I learned a lot from this consultant. I would definitely hire again!
Dasarath is equipped with a good skillset and knowledge of the latest technologies and delivered the project on time.
